name: Prans Lab: An Interactive Introduction
description:
Welcome  to the first creation of Prans Lab!

This Game Boy ROM is a modded version of Lazy Dev Game's Pokemon Battle Lab and is made with GB Studio. 

Its purpose is to introduce, in an interactive fashion, Prans Lab and the activities planned through it.

HOW TO PLAY:

You'll find the control scheme to play on your browser below:

  • Up - Up Arrow / W  
  • Down - Down Arrow / S  
  • Left - Left Arrow / A  
  • Right - Right Arrow / D  
  • A - Alt / Z / J  
  • B - Ctrl / K / X  
  • Start - Enter  
  • Select - Shift 

To talk to characters, proceed through text and interact with the environment, use Z.

You can also download the ROM file and run it on an actual Game Boy with a flashcart or on a retro handheld device like those from Anbernic!

Hope you enjoy it and please do share any bugs that you might encounter!
